output.sentences: I ran into a sign written in the chinese language
I then continued walking until I saw a ferris wheel
I got onto the ferris wheel and as I looked down, I saw the entire city
After the ride was over, I got off and I walked towards the subway station
My last stop was near the waiting area where I took a family picture
